text: This is a list of mayors of South Bend, Indiana, beginning with South Bend's incorporation as a city on May 22, 1865. The city has elected Democratic mayors since 1972. {|class="wikitable sortable" |- ! align=center|# ! Name ! Term start ! Term end !
